c_relatedProducts.richTextDescription: Nicknamed 'The Fashion Gardener' for his vibrant botanical prints, Mr Ken Scott helped develop the floral motifs we now so readily associate with the '60s and '70s. Gucci's silk-crepe shorts showcase oversized daisies from the American designer's archive and are appliquéd with an emblem on the back.
c_relatedProducts.name: Ken Scott Wide-Leg Floral-Print Silk-Crepe Shorts

c_relatedProducts.richTextDescription: The Nike Sportswear Shorts have a breathable mesh lining and lightweight woven fabric. The back pocket has a drainage grommet ideal for days spent in or out of the water.
c_relatedProducts.name: Nike Sportswear Shorts

c_relatedProducts.richTextDescription: Gucci's AW20 collection is inspired by Mr Alessandro Michele’s childhood and includes tailored shorts that take their cue from school uniforms - at the show they were styled with shrunken blazers and knee-high socks. This pair is tailored from grey wool-flannel and pleated at the waistband to enhance the wide-leg shape. Use the side adjusters to personalise the fit.
c_relatedProducts.name: Wide-Leg Pleated Wool-Flannel Shorts

name: Bottoms
richTextDescription: Elevate your wardrobe with our collection of designer pants and trousers. Whether you're looking for formal officewear, casual pants for a relaxing weekend, or dress pants for your next evening engagement, you will be sure to find the perfect piece among our selection.
